meanings.definition: A plastic card issued by a bank to allow customers to access their account electronically.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my bankcard in my wallet.
meanings.sent2: She used her bankcard to withdraw money from the ATM.
meanings.sent3: The bankcard slipped out of his pocket and into the vending machine!
meanings.sent4: Her bankcard was like a magic key that opened the door to her savings.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bankcard gleamed in the sunlight, promising convenience.

meanings.definition: To pay for something using a bankcard.
meanings.sent1: He will bankcard his groceries at the checkout.
meanings.sent2: They bankcarded the dinner bill at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bankcarded for my friend's movie ticket!
meanings.sent4: She bankcards her way through shopping sprees like a pro.
meanings.sent5: Bankcarding for online purchases is quick and easy.
